title: Distributed Ownership Models
description: Test your understanding of worker ownership and autonomous entities

questions.question: What distinguishes an autonomous entity from a traditional corporation?
options: Distributed ownership and governance among stakeholders
questions.explanation: Autonomous entities feature distributed ownership and democratic governance.

questions.question: In an autonomous entity, workers have no voice in governance.
questions.explanation: Worker voice is central to autonomous entity governance.

questions.question: What is 'exit' in the context of worker rights?
options: The ability to leave with fair compensation for contribution
questions.explanation: Exit rights ensure workers can leave with fair recognition of their contributions.
